CustomField.description: Indicates whether the implementation of the project is on track, made, or missed sign off goal date.
CustomField.formula:
IF(OR( Goal_Sign_off_Date__c >= PROJECT_SIGN_OFF_DATE__c, AND(ISBLANK(PROJECT_SIGN_OFF_DATE__c), Goal_Sign_off_Date__c - TODAY() > 21)), "On track",
IF(AND( ISBLANK(PROJECT_SIGN_OFF_DATE__c), Goal_Sign_off_Date__c - TODAY() <= 21, Goal_Sign_off_Date__c - TODAY() >= 0), "Approaching due",
IF(OR( Goal_Sign_off_Date__c < PROJECT_SIGN_OFF_DATE__c, AND(ISBLANK(PROJECT_SIGN_OFF_DATE__c), Goal_Sign_off_Date__c - TODAY() < 0)), "Past Goal", "N/A")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the implementation of the project is on track, made, or missed sign off goal date.
CustomField.label: Sign off Status
